official_title: A bill to extend title XVII of the Public Health Service Act.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends title XVII (Health Information and Health Promotion) of the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1984 through 1986. Permits the use of migrant health center grants to repay Farmers Home Administration loans for buildings.

titles.title: A bill to extend title XVII of the Public Health Service Act.
